1: <pb/><t>Ix yalanxi vin̈aj Job chi' icha tic:</t>
2: <t>Maclejec val eyab' tas svala', tato icha chi' ol eyac' snivanil in c'ool.</t>
3: <t>Nivan tzeyutej e c'ool yacb'an tzin loloni. Slajvi in lolon chi' tzex b'uchvajxi d'ayin b'ian.</t>
4: <t>¿Tocval a yed' junoc anima van vac'an oval? ¿Tom man̈ smojoc scus in c'ool e naani?</t>
5: <t>Ilinecnab'i ol ex xivb'atoc, man̈xalaj tas ol elta d'a e ti'.</t>
6: <t>Ayic tzin naancot juntzan̈ chi', tz'ib'xiq'ue in nivanil tic yuj xivelal.</t>
7: <t>¿Tas yuj nivan tiempo syil eb' chuc? Sc'och eb' icham animail, sb'inaj val eb'.</t>
8: <t>Tzato yil eb' sq'uib' yuninal, stzalaj pax eb' yoch oyan eb' yixchiquin d'a stz'ey.</t>
9: <t>Malaj tas xib'tan eb', junc'olaln̈ej yajec' eb'. Malaj syaelal eb' tz'ac'ji yuj Dios.</t>
10: <t>A noc' smam svacax eb', vach'n̈ej yel yin̈tilal noc'. Ayic stajni noc' snun svacax eb', max ec'laj yune' noc'.</t>
11: <t>A yalyuninal eb' sq'ue cheneljoc eb' icha sq'ue tz'itiljoc noc' yunetac chiva.</t>
12: <t>Ayic syab'an eb' yoch sjajil yamc'ab' yic b'it, aton te' arpa, te' tan̈b'il yed' te' spuchaji, sq'ue cheneljoc eb' yuj tzalajc'olal.</t>
13: <t>Vach'n̈ej yaj eb' chuc chi', junc'olal tz'aj sb'atcan eb' b'aj smucchaji.</t>
14: <t>Syalan eb' d'a Dios: Man̈ on̈ a tzuntzej, max yal co c'ol scojtaquejel a checnab'il.</t>
15: <t>¿Mach jun Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil chi', yic tzon̈ och ejmelal d'ay? ¿Tas scac' yala' tzon̈ tevi d'ay? xchi eb'.</t>
16: <t>A snaan eb' chuc chi' to yujn̈ej sjelanil eb' ay sb'eyumal eb'. A inxo tic max in cha vab' tas syal eb'.</t>
17: <t>¿Tom scomon cham eb' chuc icha tz'aj stup junoc candil? ¿Tom scomon javi yaelal d'a yib'an̈ eb'? ¿Tom scomon cot yoval sc'ol Dios d'a yib'an̈ eb' syab'an syail eb' yuuj?</t>
18: <t>¿Tom scomon saclemb'at eb' icha an̈ ac tz'ic'jib'at yuj chacxuxum ic'?</t>
19: <t>A eyalani to ato eb' uninab'il stupan smul smam. Palta a in tic svala' to smoj a val lac'an eb' stupan smul chi', yic syojtaquejel eb' to yuj smul eb' icha chi' tz'aj eb'.</t>
20: <t>A eb' chuc chi' smojton schaan yaelal eb' sjavi d'a yib'an̈ yuj yoval sc'ol Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil.</t>
21: <t>Ayic toxo ix cham eb', man̈xalaj yalan yic eb' yuj tas scotcan d'a yib'an̈ yuninal eb' chi'.</t>
22: <t>Palta, ¿mach syal sc'ayb'an Dios d'a jelanil? An̈ejton val Dios chi' sch'olb'itan eb' te nivac yelc'ochi.</t>
23: <t>Ay eb' vach'n̈ej tz'aj yeq'ui, tec'an val yip eb' scham eb'.</t>
25: <t>Ay pax eb' jun, te cusc'olaln̈ej tz'aj yec' eb' scham eb', malaj jab'oc tzalajc'olal syil eb'.</t>
26: <t>Palta jun, a b'aj smucchaj eb' chamnac chi', lajann̈ej ol aj eb'. Junlajan ol chijocb'at eb' yuj noc' a'ay.</t>
27: <t>Vojtac tas tze na d'a in patic yed' e chuc pensaril.</t>
28: <t>Tze naan icha tic: ¿B'ajtom ix can spat jun vin̈ chuc tic, jun vin̈ yajalxo ix yutej sb'a tic? xe chi.</t>
29: <t>¿Tom malaj b'aj tzex lolon yed' eb' anima sb'eyeq'ui? ¿Tom maj eyab' tas syic'tiej eb'?</t>
30: <t>Ayic scot yoval sc'ol Dios, syac'ancot junoc yaelal, axo eb' chuc malaj tas tz'ic'an eb'.</t>
31: <t>¿Mach tz'alanoch d'a sat eb' yuj tastac sc'ulej chi'? ¿Mach ol ac'an spac yuj tas sc'ulej eb' chi'?</t>
32: <t>Axo sb'at mucchajcan eb', stan̈vaj b'aj smucchaj eb' chi'.</t>
33: <t>Siclab'inac lum luum sb'atcan d'a yib'an̈ eb'. Jantac eb' mucb'ilxo ta', jantacto pax eb' ol mucjocpaxoc.</t>
34: <t>¿Tas tz'aj eyac'an snivanil in c'ol yed' juntzan̈ e lolonel malaj yelc'och tic? Nab'a es juntzan̈ tzeyal tic d'ayin, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
